moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 a6: A strange move to play at this stage of the game!
moves.3. Nf3 b5 4. a3: This doesn't achieve anything and better would have been Be3 or Bf4, following up with Nbd2. Then at a later stage you could perhaps have played a4.
moves.6... Bc6: A bad move. Why not simply 6...Bxe4?
moves.7. c3: Better was 7.axb4 Bxb4  8.c3 followed by 9.Bd3 to protect the e-pawn.
moves.8... Bxe4 9. Be2 Nf6 10. Bg5 Be7 11. Nc5: This allows Black to ruin your pawn structure. Better was Nb2.
moves.11... Bxc5 12. dxc5 Nc6 13. Qa4: It would have been easy to play the obvious move 13.0-0, but this is better.
moves.13... Bxf3 14. Bxf3 a5: What was Black thinking? He had to play 0-0.
moves.15. Bxc6 dxc6 16. Qxc6+ Ke7 17. Rd1 Qxd1: I think you should have seen what was coming. 26.Kc4 retains your advantage.
